message: This is fucking unbelievable!!!!

But you've gotta love his quote that he has a great relationship with blacks when he can't even manage to be civil with the other presidential candidates, Faux News personalities, comediannes, etc. while coming up with elaborate excuses why he was right to launch into a tirade, get into a twitter war, or even defend marital rape. Somehow I suspect that his great relation with anyone is that he demands they do something and they obey (when I say jump, the only question you can ask is How High ?). Of course, from the slaveowners of the old south to a pamphlet I saw at a SC BBQ joint they all claimed a great relationship with the slaves (while simultaneously living in fear that the slaves might revolt).

I agree with the post office, cover up or leave. Her baby is 3 weeks old, she knows what kind of schedule he is on and should have waited a few minutes before going to the post office. I am not against breast feeding, but there is nothing worse than seeing a woman pop out a breast in the public with no cover and feed her baby. I don't have a problem if they cover themselves in public. Why is it all of a sudden ok for woman not to cover themselves. You read stories every day like this and none of it would have happened it they had, had the common sense to cover themselves.
Awesome neighbor and a great parent .... Make a nice respectful kid !!
